files.description: EHI Export (b)(10) documentation - 3 pages describing the export format: password-protected ZIP containing meta.json, documentation.json (self-describing schema), and per-patient NDJSON data files plus non-computable files. Does NOT enumerate the actual resources or fields exported.

FHIR (g)(10) API documentation - 87 pages covering SMART on FHIR OAuth2, all API operations, and data element definitions for 22 FHIR resource types. Includes field-level attribute/type/description tables. Not the (b)(10) export, but the only public enumeration of PCE's data model.
FHIR CapabilityStatement from production endpoint - machine-readable declaration of supported resources, search parameters, and operations. Declares conformance to US Core Server and FHIR Bulk Data.
Landing page HTML - simple static page with links to both the API and EHI Export documentation PDFs, plus FHIR API base URLs.
Screenshot of the landing page showing the page layout, both documentation links, and FHIR API base URLs.
